name: | daily |
description: One of the most requested templates I’ve gotten is for a daily dashboard so here. it. IS! At the moment, the Notion calendar views don’t have a great daily view so this is my workaround! I’ve found that the most effective dashboards balance inspiration, aesthetic and function while keeping it all simple. To do this, I’ve combined features of other useful daily diaries I’ve used - mood tracking, daily goals, simple task managers and timeblocking!Now, for a little template tour:On the top: This is
